titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in St. Maries at Oxford the 24. of March being the day of his sacred Maiesties inauguration and Maundie thursday. By John Kinge Doctor of Divinity, Deane of Christ Church, and Vicechancellor of the Vniversitie.
titleStmt.author: King, John, 1559?-1621.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
